class Defaults[source]

Defaults()

Helps keep a DRY principle across this project. The split ratio was defined based on information found on Roboflow. self.trainer_template is pulled from the YOLOv5 tutorial, as is the code within prepare_YOLOv5

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Default Values

* root 
  --> parent folder of YOLOv5 repo

* resource_map
  --> defines images as ".jpg" and labels as ".txt"
* split_ratio 
  --> by default, 70/20/10 split of train/valid/test.

* data_yaml 
  --> from YOLOv5 repo
* trainer template 
  --> YOLOv5 repo
{% raw %} 
print("\n".join(["Defined defaults:"]+[f"  * {x}" for x in Defaults().__dict__.keys()]))

Defined defaults:
  * root
  * split_ratio
  * data_yaml
  * resource_map
  * trainer_template
